maintainers.name: Erik Schierboom
maintainers.bio: I am a developer with a passion for learning new languages. After falling in love with functional languages, F# quickly became my favorite language.

maintainers.name: Rob Keim
maintainers.bio: I stumbled upon this site when I was trying to learn about functional programming and F#. Little did I know, I'd wind up becoming a contributor and learning a whole lot more than what I originally intended to. I had never contributed to an open source project before, and it's been a very rewarding experience.
